title: MSFS 2024 - VelocityOne FlightSystem - Quadrant configuration twin-engine aircrafts
description:
In this video, we provide a detailed, step-by-step guide on how to configure the VelocityOne FlightSystem Quadrant for Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 (MSFS 2024) for a twin-engine aircraft. The default configuration is almost unusable, so follow along as we show you how to set up your controller for the best flight simulation experience. Whether you're a seasoned pilot or new to the flight sim community, this tutorial will help you get the most out of your VelocityOne FlightSystem Yoke. Don't miss out on optimizing your setup and enhancing your flight sim adventures!

If you want to know how to configure your yoke for the VelocityOne FlightSystem have a look at this video: https://youtu.be/pPUmG0kOVCs

00:00 - intro
00:19 - intro video
00:28 - creating the profiles
03:24 - configuring the VelocityOne FlightSystem Quadrant
11:02 - testing the configuration
17:22 - bonus tip: individual buttons per engine
20:17 - outro

If you are looking for steps how to configure the yoke, check this video: 
https://youtu.be/Qkdgql7xCww
